title: Google dropping features and fancy watches featuring The Mr. Mobile, Michael Fisher
description: The Mr. Mobile a.k.a. Michael Fisher drops by and joins Adam and Jonathan this week. Samsung has (NOT!) sold 1 million Galaxy Fold units, and we’re talking about why or why not. We take a look at the latest Moto360 coming from Motorola (more like Nope-arola), and the Fossil Gen 5 smart watches. Google is bringing “Feature Drops” to the Pixel and what’s up with that? And final thoughts from Hawaii and Snapdragon.  Tech We Like: Boss Audio BVCP9685 Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast. Recorded December 13, 2019 Topics CES 2020: What to expect from the Las Vegas trade show Samsung Galaxy Fold sales numbers are in (Update: Actually, they're not) Oppo shows off AR Glass, 5G, and under-screen selfie cameras at Inno Day 2019 Moto 360 (2019) review: A good watch on a so-so platform The Fossil Gen 5 Smartwatch is the best Wear OS watch you can buy Google Pixel 4 update: Auto call-screen, improved Duo calls, more coming soon Yesterday's Google Pixel 4 'feature drop'? Expect more of them quarterly Xiaomi Redmi K30 5G announced: It's easily the cheapest 5G phone The Android Authority podcast is: Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy Produced by Adam Doud Special Guest appearnace by: Michael Fisher - @TheMrMobile Check out the other podcasts in our network! The DGiT Daily podcast The SoundGuys Podcast

html:
Dec 14, 2019

The Mr. Mobile a.k.a. Michael Fisher drops by and joins Adam and Jonathan this week. Samsung has (NOT!) sold 1 million Galaxy Fold units, and we’re talking about why or why not. We take a look at the latest Moto360 coming from Motorola (more like Nope-arola), and the Fossil Gen 5 smart watches. Google is bringing “Feature Drops” to the Pixel and what’s up with that? And final thoughts from Hawaii and Snapdragon. 

Tech We Like: Boss Audio BVCP9685

Visit http://www.andauth.co/PodcastPicks

Affiliate disclosure: We may receive compensation in connection with your purchase of products via links on this page. The compensation received will never influence the content, topics or posts made on this podcast.

Recorded December 13, 2019

Topics

CES 2020: What to expect from the Las Vegas trade show

Samsung Galaxy Fold sales numbers are in (Update: Actually, they're not)

Oppo shows off AR Glass, 5G, and under-screen selfie cameras at Inno Day 2019

Moto 360 (2019) review: A good watch on a so-so platform

The Fossil Gen 5 Smartwatch is the best Wear OS watch you can buy

Google Pixel 4 update: Auto call-screen, improved Duo calls, more coming soon

Yesterday's Google Pixel 4 'feature drop'? Expect more of them quarterly

Xiaomi Redmi K30 5G announced: It's easily the cheapest 5G phone

The Android Authority podcast is:

Adam Doud - @DeadTechnology

Jonathan Feist - @JFeist1 / @DroneRushcom

Joe Hindy - @ThatJoeHindy

Produced by Adam Doud

Special Guest appearnace by:

Michael Fisher - @TheMrMobile
